headline: Revvity joins peers Thermo Fisher, Danaher in tariff warning, maintains profit outlook
summary: Medical equipment maker Revvity on Monday joined larger peers in warning about the impact of tariffs imposed by the U.S. President Donald Trump's administration, but maintained its annual profit...
